Hi Ben,

Currently, the site is configured to apply surcharge logic based solely on the card type (e.g., AMEX, Visa, Mastercard), without distinguishing whether the card is domestic or international.

To meet your updated requirements, we can adjust the process by introducing an additional field. For example, when a user selects a card type like AMEX, a secondary dropdown could appear asking whether the card is international or domestic. This will allow us to apply the correct surcharge rate based on the user’s selection.

If you'd like, we can implement this in the staging environment first so you can test and confirm the workflow before it goes live.

Please let me know how you’d like to proceed.

full_threads.body: This ticket has been open for over 5 days. If action is still required, please prioritize it. Otherwise, kindly provide an update - either to confirm it can be closed or if a follow-up with the client is needed.
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Hi Ben,

We are looking into this and will update you next week.

Hi Joel,

Sorry its taken some time to get back to you - I have been investigating this with Stripe.

Can we please remove all current credit card/stripe charges and replace with the following;

International Cards - 3.5%

Domestic Cards - 1.7%

0.30c transaction fee for all Credit Card transactions

Please note not all AMEX are international cards, stripe determines international as cards that are regularly based/used overseas regardless of if it's AMEX/Visa/Mastercard.

Thanks

Regards,

Ben Rookes
OPERATIONS MANAGER

0456 553 848 | brookes@novaricollective.com

03 9580 4102 | Unit 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside VIC 3195

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Ben,

We are currently looking into this. Upon review, the AMEX surcharge applied to the site is 4.5%, whereas the Stripe fee appears to be 1.7%. Could you kindly confirm these figures?

Here’s a breakdown based on Proposal-9872:
  • Total Amount: $7,962.40
  • AMEX Surcharge (4.5%):
    $7,962.40 × 4.5% = $358.31
    Adding a fixed fee of $0.30, the Total Surcharge = $358.61
  • Total Including Surcharge:
    $7,962.40 + $358.61 = $8,321.01

  • Stripe Fee (1.7% of $8,321.01):
    $8,321.01 × 1.7% = $141.76

Hi Joel,

Please see attached email - regarding the below pricing / fees issue

Regards,

Ben Rookes
